DOC.brief_summary: Study hypothesis is that patients on antipsychotics medication treated with metformin will show loss in weight and improved measures of glucose metabolism.
DOC.brief_title: Metformin for Weight Loss in Schizophrenia
DOC.detailed_description: Patients who had gained more than 10 lbs of weight in the last 3 months or had BMI of 35 or greater were treated with metformin up to 200 mg/day in an open label study of up to 3 months time. Changes in weight and glucose measures were recorded.
